conspiracy_theories.name: Deep State
conspiracy_theories.description: Refers to a hidden powerful faction within the government allegedly working to undermine Trump and his supporters.

conspiracy_theories.name: Election Fraud
conspiracy_theories.description: Claims of widespread election fraud, especially in the 2020 presidential election, focusing on alleged issues with mail-in ballots.

conspiracy_theories.name: QAnon
conspiracy_theories.description: While not explicitly endorsed, Trump has shown indirect support for followers of QAnon, a conspiracy about a deep-rooted cabal involved in child trafficking and satanic rituals.

conspiracy_theories.name: Wuhan Virus
conspiracy_theories.description: Refers to claims that COVID-19 originated as an intentional act from China, possibly from a lab leak.

conspiracy_theories.name: Vaccine Skepticism
conspiracy_theories.description: Suggestions that COVID-19 vaccines might not be safe or effective, fostering doubt over vaccination.

conspiracy_theories.name: Missing Emails
conspiracy_theories.description: Refers to the 2016 scandal involving Hillary Clinton’s deleted emails, which Trump frequently highlighted.

conspiracy_theories.name: Biden Family Scandal
conspiracy_theories.description: Claims of corruption within the Biden family, particularly involving Hunter Biden’s business dealings and alleged exploitation of Biden’s influence.

conspiracy_theories.name: Climate Change Hoax
conspiracy_theories.description: Skepticism toward climate change, suggesting it's a 'hoax' promoted by global elites for profit.
